fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: SURFmarket participates in OpenAIRE2020 which is part of the Horizon 2020 programme
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: The mother organisation SURF holds Memberships of many national and international platforms such as PRACE, GEANT, Knowledge Exchange, e-IRG and many more.
goals__remit: SURFmarket zorgt er als ICT-marktplaats voor dat studenten, docenten, onderzoekers en medewerkers binnen het onderwijs en onderzoek tegen de best mogelijke voorwaarden kunnen beschikken over ICT-producten en –diensten die zeer laagdrempelig toegankelijk zijn en waarvan de rechtmatigheid is gegarandeerd.
relevant_communication: SURFmarket has related relevant activities. Such as participation (on behalf of SURF) in the Knowlegde Exchange initiative (www.knowledge-exchange.info), organises national and international workshops around ICT use in Higher education and research and acts as a service broker for services in education.
